divs: Sighting Detailsi was talking with my brother and father on the balcony outside of my bedroom when i first noticed what looked like a star rising in the north part of the sky. At first i thought it was a star until i realized it was rising up in the sky. I thought it was extrodinary during the duration of the experience. I felt excited and extremely intrested. I stood there and watched it the whole time. not taking my eyes off it. Afterwards i felt lucky that i had seen such a thing. I lost sight of the object as it disappeard in the southern part of the sky. the light simply faded and was no longer visable.
Summary: object(light) rose from north, traveled north to south, light disappeared in southside of sky
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around June 23rd 2007
